title: India planning to kill Kashmiri leaders in guise of COVID-19 :Shehryar Afridi
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 15 (APP):Kashmir Committee Chairman Shehryar khan Afridi has said that Hindutva ragime in India was planning to kill Kashmiri resistance leaders in the name of coronavirus pandemic.
Hindutva regime in #India is planning to kill #Kashmiri resistance leaders in name of pandemic as most of #Kashmiri resistance leaders quietly being moved to jails in worst #Covid-19 hit areas World must take action now@WHO@OHCHRAsia@Debbie_abrahamshttps://t.co/IqXyYauYfu
â€” Shehryar Afridi (@ShehryarAfridi1) May 14, 2021
In a tweet, he urged the world to take action as most of Kashmiri resistance leaders quietly being moved to jails in worst Covid-19 hit areas.
